summary: This document outlines the Know Your Customer (KYC) details for Jeffrey Epstein and related entities, including the 2017 Caterpillar Trust. It includes information about account ownership, relationships, and financial details relevant to Epstein's financial activities and trusts. The document highlights Epstein's connections to various financial entities and individuals, as well as his significant wealth and business operations. This document discusses the approval process for the 2017 Caterpillar Trust associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It outlines the due diligence performed, the risk factors identified, and the relationships with notable individuals such as Bill Clinton and Prince Andrew. The document emphasizes the compliance measures taken by Deutsche Bank in relation to Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of the KYC document, detailing his financial activities, trusts, and connections to various individuals and entities.

persons.name: Stevan Oldfield
persons.context: Stevan Oldfield is identified as the relationship manager for Epstein's accounts and is responsible for overseeing the financial relationship.

persons.name: Daphne Wallace
persons.context: Daphne Wallace is mentioned as a trustee for the 2017 Caterpillar Trust and is involved in the management of Epstein's financial interests.

persons.name: Wallace, Daphne
persons.context: Daphne Wallace is also noted as a controller at Southern Trust Company, indicating her role in managing financial operations.

persons.name: Groff
persons.context: Groff is identified as an attorney associated with Epstein's financial dealings, providing legal support.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO) of the 2017 Caterpillar Trust, which is managed by Southern Trust Company Inc.

persons.name: Bill Clinton
persons.role: Former President of the United States
persons.context: Bill Clinton is mentioned in relation to his close association with Jeffrey Epstein, which raised concerns during the due diligence process.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Prince Andrew is noted for maintaining a close relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, which was considered a risk factor in the KYC review.

persons.name: Matthew Purcell
persons.context: Matthew Purcell is involved in the KYC review process and is responsible for ensuring compliance with due diligence procedures.

persons.name: M. Gallivan
persons.context: M. Gallivan is mentioned as a signatory for the approval of the trust, indicating a leadership role in the compliance process.

persons.name: Yoonsun Chung
persons.context: Yoonsun Chung is also involved in the compliance process and is a signatory on the document.

connections.description: Stevan Oldfield manages Epstein's financial accounts and is responsible for the relationship with the bank.
Daphne Wallace serves as a trustee for the trusts associated with Epstein, managing the assets on behalf of the beneficiaries.
Daphne Wallace works at Southern Trust Company, where Stevan Oldfield is the relationship manager.
Groff is an attorney providing legal services to Epstein in relation to his financial activities.
Jeffrey Epstein is noted to have a close relationship with Bill Clinton, which raised concerns during the KYC review.
Jeffrey Epstein is mentioned to have a close relationship with Prince Andrew, which was considered a risk factor in the KYC review.
Matthew Purcell, as a compliance officer, is responsible for overseeing the KYC process related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.
M. Gallivan, as the Office Director, oversees Matthew Purcell's compliance work regarding Epstein's accounts.
Yoonsun Chung works alongside Matthew Purcell in the compliance department at Deutsche Bank.

events.title: Initial Funding for Trust
events.description: The document states that initial funding for the 2017 Caterpillar Trust must take place by this date to purchase assets.

events.title: Account Opening Request
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein reached out to open a new deposit account for his annuity trust.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, United States
Utter Sant James, Saint Thomas, 00802, United States
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is a self-employed individual with significant wealth, estimated net worth over $500 million.
Epstein has a history of financial management, having founded his own firm, J. Epstein & Co.
The 2017 Caterpillar Trust is a grantor retained annuity trust that holds membership interest in IGO Company LLC.
Daphne Wallace is both a trustee for Epstein's trusts and a controller at Southern Trust Company.
The document indicates that Epstein has connections to politically exposed persons, including Prince Andrew and Bill Clinton.
The 2017 Caterpillar Trust is registered in the US Virgin Islands.
Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the Ultimate Beneficial Owner of the 2017 Caterpillar Trust.
There are negative media associations with Jeffrey Epstein, including his relationships with Bill Clinton and Prince Andrew.
Due diligence searches did not find any names on sanctions lists related to the trust.
The document outlines the compliance procedures followed by Deutsche Bank in relation to Epstein's accounts.
